data.message: we need a new collaboration with kendrick lamar :(

replies.message:
Eminem made a collaboration with lamar, called love game  
A7la ta7ya yasta 😄

yeah i know  Adel TyCo Pk
i said a new one ;)
honestly if it's anything as bad as love game i don't wanna hear it...
I don't get the whole hype over Kendrick. He's not that much of a good rapper.

Okay 1. Dakota, Love Game is a dope track. The lyricism by both Em & K. Dot is unbelievable. The sample track is a bit random but still the song is amazing. And 2. Daniel, Kendrick Lamar is honestly the next great one in rap. He only has 3 albums & he's already on the same level as the true greats in rap (Tupac, Biggie, Eminem, Nas, etc.) He's gonna be what Pac & Big would've become had they not been killed

ok 1. Kendrick Lamar will NEVER be on nas or biuggies level and 2. i like kendrick and eminem but i didn't like love game the beat sounded retarded and 3. tbh on kendricks newest album i only liked a few songs the rest sounded weird it definitely wasn't as good as GKMC
